title: The Bachelorette Angie Kent jokes about the suitors being 'on steroids'
text:
She will be introduced to 18 charming suitors during next week's season premiere of The Bachelorette.

And Angie Kent made an eyebrow-raising joke about her bachelors on Friday, hinting that some of them could be using performance-enhancing drugs.

She made the awkward gag during an interview with 10 Daily in which she said that The Bachelorette was 'like dating on steroids'.

'They could be on steroids!' The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has made a VERY awkward joke about her suitors ahead of the season premiere

'It's kind of like you're yourself, but you're dating on steroids. The dudes aren't on steroids, it's just dating on steroids... I mean, they could be. I don't know,' she said.

Angie added that she was 'frightened' of having her heart broken, but was prepared to take the risk in a bid to find lasting love.

'I'm putting myself in that position, really for the first time, to have my heart broken. I think it's worth it because the love you feel... does outweigh the risk,' she said.

Say what? Speaking with 10 Daily, Angie jokingly hinted that some of the contestants could be using performance-enhancing drugs

Sadly, it looks like Angie is already set to have her heart broken by flamboyant Englishman Ciarran Stott.

On Thursday, a source revealed Ciarran had signed up for the show to get back at his ex-girlfriend Renee Barrett, who appeared on Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor.

'As soon as he found out she'd been cast on Matt's season and was about to start filming, he decided to get on The Bachelorette,' said the insider.

'Casting producers were aware of this and it definitely helped his cause. His friends are saying he mostly went on to get back at Renee,' they added.

Before being cast as The Bachelorette, Angie was famous for her appearances on Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: She will be introduced to 18 charming suitors during next week's season premiere of The Bachelorette.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
